results.name: Expansion of (3-2*x-3*x^2)/(1-x-x^2-x^3).
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Martin Burtscher, Igor Szczyrba, Rafał Szczyrba, Analytic Representations of the n-anacci Constants and Generalizations Thereof, Journal of Integer Sequences, Vol. 18 (2015), Article 15.4.5.
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,1,1).
program: (MAGMA) I:=[3, 1, 1]; [n le 3 select I[n] else Self(n-1)+Self(n-2) +Self(n-3): n in [1..40]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Oct 17 2012
